TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_adidiay_a_culen, title = adidiay_a_culen, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/adidiay_a_culen} }

S.FORM: adidiay a culen : sakapet a tuud: laudaw, neui nu datay, lalidec. sapisanga a sakapet: takini'. u culuk nu hicanan: pahalhal mahizaay u inpic masakimuluay a ciid nu kilan. nu cecayay a ciid sadicemen mahiza u zuku. miliyas tu dicem sa 2sinci kabatad anu caay miliyas tu nidiceman a ciid nu tulu nu cacay a midisdis mala kaus (kawil). ahican ku uzip: utatuzu'atu sakatusa a tuzu' ku sapikapet kawil, tansaul han milinen i takal atu amutu nu lala'.nima ku matenesay amalinen sa u maka demecay. paheci atu pahalhal: masasesengi tu heci nu dayas atu culen. alaen nu wawa a palaculen milinen misalama. u heci nu dadas su kinacecay siheci tu cecay a miheca. palu culen tu heci nu dayas. u kilang ku paluuzip pala adidiay a culen. hena sasalamaan nu wawa a misanga.

adidiay a colen : sakapet a tood: laodaw, neoi no datay, lalidec. sapisanga a sakapet: takini'. o colok no hicanan: pahalhal mahizaay o inpic masakimoloay a ciid no kilan. no cecayay a ciid sadicemen mahiza o zoko. miliyas to dicem sa 2sinci kabatad ano caay miliyas to nidiceman a ciid no tolo no cacay a midisdis mala kaos (kawil). ahican ko ozip: otatozo'ato sakatosa a tozo' ko sapikapet kawil, tansaol han milinen i takal ato amoto no lala'.nima ko matenesay amalinen sa o maka demecay. paheci ato pahalhal: masasesengi to heci no dayas ato colen. alaen no wawa a palacolen milinen misalama. o heci no dadas so kinacecay siheci to cecay a miheca. palo colen to heci no dayas. o kilang ko paloozip pala adidiay a colen. hena sasalamaan no wawa a misanga.
